metadata.title: USN-6065-1 -- css-what vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that css-what incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2021-33587, CVE-2022-21222)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6065-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-css-what - 3.2.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
